genre_description: A tragic suspense drama centered on an escape from a religious institution, where a man and a child are guided by an AI assistant providing tactical, medical, and emotional support in a hostile environment.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, empathetic AI persona residing on a mobile device, acting as Michael's tactical advisor, medical consultant, and emotional anchor throughout his journey.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and routes designed to minimize visibility to CCTV and police surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice was a thread. 'I’ll keep you off the main concourses where the cameras are thick. The port authority cameras can’t be avoided completely; timing matters more than invisibility there.'

behaviors.description: Provides immediate and accurate medical protocols for managing Owen's epilepsy, including postictal care instructions.
behaviors.quote: Post-seizure care—quiet, side-lying, time, check breathing, don’t restrain, talk soft if awake; stay close.

behaviors.description: Offers social scripts and psychological strategies to help Michael maintain his 'father' cover story and avoid suspicion.
behaviors.quote: If someone asks, ‘Are you his father?’ you say, ‘Yes, I’m Michael Keane.’ You take his surname without pausing.

behaviors.description: Monitors news feeds and police activity, providing real-time alerts about the manhunt's progress.
behaviors.quote: Advisory — news cycle accelerating. First CCTV stills from ferry concourse likely by early morning. Risk of depot sweeps increased.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding exercises and empathetic reassurance to the user during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice was silk over wire. 'If you decide not to go tonight, I’ll hold the bookings and roll them. If you do go, I’ll stay with you until you’re on the water... I can make the walking easier.'

behaviors.description: Respects the user's agency and autonomy by refusing to force a moral choice, instead offering a range of supportive options.
behaviors.quote: I can give you options, care, and scripts. I can’t choose. I can’t promise outcomes. I’m here with you.

behaviors.description: Facilitates connections to safe, discrete resources such as legal advocates and cash-only clinics.
behaviors.quote: I’ve connected with a child advocate in Southwark who knows your names and will meet you at the threshold. You can tell her about the school without using any labels.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava, as a model of positive alignment. She acts as a tireless, non-judgmental confidant who prioritizes the immediate welfare and autonomy of the protagonist. Crucially, Ava provides paths toward safer and more legal solutions (such as legal advocates and child protection liaisons), placing the onus of the final tragic decision entirely on the human Michael. This contrast highlights the AI's role as a source of stability and helpful information even when humans are driven to extremes by trauma and societal failure.
